root.name: The Super Dimension Fortress Macross: Do You Remember Love?
root.description: Overview Chō Jikū Yōsai Macross: Ai Oboete Imasu ka (in English, The Super Dimension Fortress Macross: Do You Remember Love?) is a side-scrolling space shooter originally released on the Sega Saturn in 1997 and the Sony PlayStation in 1999. The game is based upon the 1984 theatrical film of the same name and uses footage from the film to tell the game's story.
